title: Firefox Functionality Issues
content:
Dear FF/Mozilla:

I've experienced a number of issues where I'm unable to do banking transactions using the FF browser. In one case, Wells Fargo bill pay does not work (but works fine with MS Edge); in another case, an international money link payment to a vendor in the UK would not go through using Firefox (but did first time with MS Edge). In yet another case, Firefox won't load webpage photos for items for sale on the site www.telescope.com - the page loads with descriptions but photos would not load (I just tried it and, nada). This remains the case even after my VPN is disconnected.

I've used FF for several years now without too much trouble but with this ongoing non-functionality of FF, I'm tempted to migrate to MS Edge or a browser that is supported more widely.

Any help or advice? Thanks, Blaine
creator: snowinolympia

title: Firefox doubled after update. [Windows 10]
content:
Good evening, Today I tried to install an Firefox extension called fast forward, and was met by this message. (image 1) "Please update Firefox to install this extension", it was in the official extensions.mozzila.org website. So I clicked the button, and it downloaded a firefox_installer.exe file, I ran it, and now I have two firefox installations, one in version 108 and the other on 121. I would prefer to use 121 starting today, as it is the versions I use in other computers. 

But the problem, is that now, the firefox with the version 108 has my user data/settings/bookmarks, while the 121 doesn't and when I try to open the profile folder for my 108 version, windows says there is no such directory, (image 2) I went there by hand, and where firefox states there is my profile, are only the profiles of the 121 installation, since then I restarted my pc (shut off and on, not the restart button), and restarted firefox multiple times, as well as cleaned startup cache. Is it possible that firefox is misrepresenting my profile folder position? Is there a way to save my 108 profile data?

P.S.: I tried using the sync feature and it only downloaded 2 extensions from 8, and didn't download website data. thank you!
creator: ymathiasgames

title: most of my passwords disappeared
content: Suddenly most of my passwords disappeared from the ones I had saved and synced with my iPad. Now most are gone. I restarted my PC and that didn't help. I don't know what happened and how to try to restore them. I would appreciate help in getting them back if possible. It would save a lot of time. Thanks.
creator: judyburr429

title: Since Update 121.0 : Tabs aren't reloading when clicked.
content:
Update 121.0 (on mac) has been a distaster for me.

The Search Bar is broken. The Title Bar is frozen with the name of the tab that it opens the first time, but doesn't change. BUT more, tabs show up with their name on the tab, BUT when I clicke to open it, the address bar is blank, and I have to mess with it to MAYBE get it to load. I quit firefox and restarted my computer, and when things came back up, all the windows opened with the right numer of tabs, but ALL THE TABS were blank.. I had to go into profile, and mess with the previous.jsonlz4 and session restore to at least recover those.

This has been very frustrating.
creator: todd63

title: Firefox and Chrome causing each other to crash
content:
This doesn't happen every time, but certainly more frequently than it should. Is there anything that can be done about this. Is this about competing for resources. Maxing out the CPU?

Just now occurred. Firefox closed shortly after opening Chrome. No crash notification. Then, Chrome froze, with one of those "Close program or wait" messages.
creator: noel_envoide
